title: lane_tod

timeday_id.description: Conditionally required (either timeday_id or time_day). Foreign key to time_set_definitions.

time_day.description: Conditionally required (either timeday_id or time_day). XXXXXXXX_HHMM_HHMM, where XXXXXXXX is a bitmap of days of the week, Sunday-Saturday, Holiday. The HHMM are the start and end times.

lane_num.description: Required. Lane number identified as offset to the right from the centerline. i.e. -1, 1, 2 (use left-to-rightnumbering).

allowed_uses.description: Optional. Set of allowed uses; comma-separated. Foreign key to use_definition or use sets.

r_barrier.description:
Optional. Whether a barrier exists to prevent vehicles from changing lanes to the right (default is None).
- '' (the default). Indicates that a vehicle can change lanes, provided that the vehicle-type is permitted in the destination lane
- `Regulatory`. There is a regulatory prohibition (e.g., a double-white solid line) against changing lanes, but no physical barrier
- `Physical`. A physical barrier (e.g., a curb, Jersey barrier) is in place.

l_barrier.description:
Optional. Whether a barrier exists to prevent vehicles from changing lanes to the right (default is None).
- '' (the default). Indicates that a vehicle can change lanes, provided that the vehicle-type is permitted in the destination lane
- `Regulatory`. There is a regulatory prohibition (e.g., a double-white solid line) against changing lanes, but no physical barrier
- `Physical`. A physical barrier (e.g., a curb, Jersey barrier) is in place.

width.description: Optional. Width of the lane, feet.

description: An optional file that handles day-of-week and time-of-day restrictions on lanes that traverse entire links.
